Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and deliver exceptional value. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and functionality designed to enhance your daily experience. Given its unique features and the care put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $125. I trust that you will appreciate its worth and find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
